Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.marketview

Class NewDepositView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.views.marketview.NewDepositView
public class NewDepositView
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the visualization of a new deposit state by the user
Author:
Mirko Genoni

  • Constructor Details

    • NewDepositView

      public NewDepositView​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> informationReceived, boolean additionalDeposit, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> type, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalDepositState)
      This constructor initializes the class for the phase after the market
      Parameters:
      depositState - is the current deposit of the state
      informationReceived - are the material received by the market
      additionalDeposit - is the boolean that indicates if there ia an additional deposit activated
      type - are the type that the additional deposits can contain
      additionalDepositState - is the current state of the additional deposit

    • NewDepositView

      This constructor initializes the class for the view turn
      Parameters:
      depositState - is the current deposit of the state
      strongbox - is the current strongbox state
      additionalDepositType - are the type that the additional deposits can contain
      additionalDepositState - is the current state of the additional deposit
